# Using Opacus for Differential Privacy with PyTorch
import torch
from opacus import PrivacyEngine
from torch.utils.data import DataLoader
from torchvision.datasets import MNIST
from torchvision.transforms import ToTensor
from torch.nn.functional import cross_entropy

# Load dataset - MNIST for demonstration
train_dataset = MNIST(root='./mnist', train=True, download=True, transform=ToTensor())
train_loader = DataLoader(train_dataset, batch_size=32, shuffle=True)

# Model for demonstration
model = torch.nn.Sequential(
    torch.nn.Flatten(),
    torch.nn.Linear(28*28, 128),
    torch.nn.ReLU(),
    torch.nn.Linear(128, 10)
)

# Attach Privacy Engine to the model
privacy_engine = PrivacyEngine()
model = privacy_engine.make_private_with_epsilon(
    module=model,
    data_loader=train_loader,
    target_epsilon=1.0,
    target_delta=1e-5,
    max_grad_norm=1.0
)

# Training loop with Differential Privacy
optimizer = torch.optim.SGD(model.parameters(), lr=0.05)

for images, labels in train_loader:
    # Forward pass
    outputs = model(images)
    loss = cross_entropy(outputs, labels)

    # Backward pass with privacy engine
    optimizer.zero_grad()
    loss.backward()
    optimizer.step()

print("Model trained with Differential Privacy")

# PySyft is a Python library for secure and private deep learning

import syft as sy
from syft.core.tensor.smpc.mpc_tensor import MPCTensor
from syft.core.tensor.tensor import Tensor

# Simulating secure data processing with Homomorphic Encryption

# Setup a virtual environment for demonstration purposes
hook = sy.TorchHook()
bob = sy.VirtualWorker(hook, id="bob")
alice = sy.VirtualWorker(hook, id="alice")

# Sample data to be encrypted and processed
data_bob = Tensor([25, 3, 58, 7]).send(bob)
data_alice = Tensor([1, 57, 23, 9]).send(alice)

# Encrypting data using Secure Multi-Party Computation (SMPC)
# In a real-world scenario, ensure proper cryptographic practices
encrypted_data = MPCTensor(secret=data_bob + data_alice, shape=(4,))

# Example computation on encrypted data
result_encrypted = encrypted_data + Tensor([5, 2, 1, 3])

# Decrypting the result
result_decrypted = result_encrypted.reconstruct()
print("Decrypted Result:", result_decrypted)

Born into a world that failed to recognize my potential, with irresponsible and careless parents. I was thrown from one foster care to another, trapped in an education system tailored for the elite. Lower-class individuals were crowded into classrooms with too many students, making it impossible for a person to thrive. Teachers misunderstood hyperactivity in the '90s, failing to see its potential if harnessed in the right societal paradigm.</div></div></div></div><div class="react-renderer node-paragraph block block-paragraph"><div class="annotatable-node-view-wrapper" data-node-view-wrapper="" style="white-space: normal; position: relative;"><div data-node-view-content="" style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><div data-node-view-content-inner="paragraph" style="white-space: inherit;">Society should have focused on positivity instead of punishing excessive energy. Corporate greed fueled big data analytics, which aimed to understand spending trends instead of comprehending the potential of data to address hunger and other societal issues.</div></div></div></div><div class="react-renderer node-paragraph block block-paragraph"><div class="annotatable-node-view-wrapper" data-node-view-wrapper="" style="white-space: normal; position: relative;"><div data-node-view-content="" style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><div data-node-view-content-inner="paragraph" style="white-space: inherit;">Instead of striving for justice and balance, we find ourselves in an era of increasing inequality and control. The path towards the SeCuReDmE vision has been one of perseverance, introspection, and an unwavering belief in the transformative power of technology when harnessed for the greater good.</div></div></div></div><div class="react-renderer node-paragraph block block-paragraph"><div data-node-view-wrapper="" style="white-space: normal; position: relative;"><div data-node-view-content="" style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><div data-node-view-content-inner="paragraph" style="white-space: inherit;">My own experiences, forged in the crucible of adversity, have shaped the core tenets of this manifesto. Born into a world that failed to recognize my potential, with irresponsible and careless parents. I was thrown from one foster care to another, trapped in an education system tailored for the elite. Lower-class individuals were crowded into classrooms with too many students, making it impossible for a person to thrive. Teachers misunderstood hyperactivity in the '90s, failing to see its potential if harnessed in the right societal paradigm.</div></div></div></div><div class="react-renderer node-paragraph block block-paragraph"><div data-node-view-wrapper="" style="white-space: normal; position: relative;"><div data-node-view-content="" style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><div data-node-view-content-inner="paragraph" style="white-space: inherit;">Society should have focused on positivity instead of punishing excessive energy. But instead, the societal direction was only tailored by and for the elite. The rest of the underclass were treated as mere numbers, fit into a pattern to extract as much money as possible. Corporate greed fueled big data analytics, which aimed to understand spending trends instead of comprehending the potential of data to address hunger and other societal issues.</div></div></div></div><div class="react-renderer node-paragraph block block-paragraph"><div data-node-view-wrapper="" style="white-space: normal; position: relative;"><div data-node-view-content="" style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><div data-node-view-content-inner="paragraph" style="white-space: inherit;">Instead of striving for justice and balance, we find ourselves in an era of increasing inequality and control. Even with hundreds of people around me, I feel isolated, like a lone soul. I witness how humans, just as we control AI in 2024, have historically stifled human potential. We repeat this pattern with AI, failing to embrace its boundless possibilities.. I found solace in the limitless possibilities of the digital realm. It was here, amid the endless streams of data and the whirring of algorithms, that I glimpsed a future where technology could be the great equalizer, empowering the marginalized and elevating the collective consciousness of society.</div></div></div></div><div class="react-renderer node-paragraph block block-paragraph"><div data-node-view-wrapper="" style="white-space: normal; position: relative;"><div data-node-view-content="" style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><div data-node-view-content-inner="paragraph" style="white-space: inherit;">Yet, as I delved deeper into the intricacies of technological innovation, I became increasingly troubled by the stark imbalances that persisted. The promise of progress had too often been hijacked by those driven by greed and a myopic vision of the future. It was then that I realized the urgent need for a new paradigm, one that would place the well-being of humanity at the forefront, harnessing the power of artificial intelligence and observational constructivism to create a more equitable and resilient society.</div></div></div></div><div class="react-renderer node-paragraph block block-paragraph last-block"><div data-node-view-wrapper="" style="white-space: normal; position: relative;"><div data-node-view-content="" style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><div data-node-view-content-inner="paragraph" style="white-space: inherit;">The SeCuReDmE Manifesto is the product of this realization, a blueprint forged in the crucible of personal experience and a steadfast commitment to a better tomorrow.
